casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jathiyah al-BAYYINAH. No. 550A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 21, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State. Janet Moore, Assistant Public Defender, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, for Jathiyah al-Bayyinah.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of January 2005 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of January 2005."
